column3: Tested ACK (tested that SetupEnvironment still does what it should, not tested that #3136 / #5380 don't occur anymore - can you try @diapolo?).\n

Tested. ACK.
#3136 is fixed with this PR.
#5380 still occurs (OSX 10.10). I don't see a relation between this PR and #5380. Multiple leaks detected (could be not real leaks because of BDB style of handling memory):
![bildschirmfoto 2015-03-21 um 15 57 10](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/178464/6765509/1c260ace-cfe3-11e4-892a-7db61afe7e70.png)
Tested ACK, #3136 is fixed with this PR :), great!\n
Are you sure this will still work for boost filesystem v3? I'd assume this `#ifdef` construction was added for a reason.\n
Yes, it's actually `std::locale("")` what raises the exception, which is called from within `path::codecvt()`.\n
This line is the reason for https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/6078\n
